title: Mood Board — Fix website item metadata
description: Fix website links showing 'Untitled video' as title. Detect content type (website vs video) and populate title from OpenGraph metadata.
acceptanceCriteria: Content type correctly detected (website vs video)

steps.details: In the item creation pipeline, detect whether a URL is a video platform (TikTok, YouTube, Instagram) or a generic website. Set the item type/platform accordingly.
Replace the fallback 'Untitled video' with logic that: 1) uses og:title if available, 2) falls back to <title> tag, 3) falls back to domain name. Never show 'Untitled video' for websites.
For non-video URLs, fetch the page HTML and extract og:title, og:description, og:image. Store in the moodboard_items metadata fields.

technicalNotes: OpenGraph extraction can reuse the existing HTML scrape logic from the Instagram path
Some websites block server-side fetching — handle 403/timeout gracefully
